00014 template<class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SOURCE1, class SOURCE2>
00015 class SourceMixedOf 
00016         : public SourceOf<DATA, DIMENSIONALITY, PRECISION>
00017 {
00018 protected:
00019         SOURCE1* m_psource1;
00020         SOURCE2* m_psource2;

00026                 ,       m_psource1(NULL)
00027                 ,       m_psource2(NULL)
00028 
00029         {
00030         }
00031 
00032         SourceMixedOf(SourceMixedOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SOURCE1,SOURCE2>&src)
00033                 : SourceOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION>(src)
00034         {
00035                 m_psource1=src.m_psource1;
00036                 ClaimPointer(m_psource1);
00037                 m_psource2=src.m_psource2;
00038                 ClaimPointer(m_psource2);
00039         }
00040 
00041         virtual ~SourceMixedOf()
00042         {
00043                 ReleasePointer(m_psource1);
00044                 ReleasePointer(m_psource2);
00045         }
00046

00052         }

00070         {
00071                 ChangePointer(m_psource1,psource1);
00072                 ChangePointer(m_psource2,psource2);
00073         }
00074 
00075         void WipeSource()
00076         {
00077                 m_psource1=NULL;
00078                 m_psource2=NULL;
00079         }

00081         virtual String Describe() const
00082         {
00083                 return (
00084                         _LINE + "SourceMixedOf(" + DIMENSIONALITY + "D)" + LINE_ + 
00085                         this->DescribeCommon()
00086                 );
00087         }
00088 
00089         virtual String DescribeCommon() const
00090         {
00091                 return _INDENT + (
00092                         _LINE + "size: " + this->Size().Describe() + LINE_ + 
00093                         ( _INDENT + "source 1:" + LINE_ + 
00094                                 this->m_psource1->Describe() + 
00095                                 this->m_psource2->Describe() 
00096                         )
00097                 );
00098         }
00099

00101

00110                 return pt.Bound(
00111                         PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION> (PRECISION(0)),
00112                         this->Size()
00113                 );

00117         {
00118                 this->m_ptSize=this->PSource1()->Size();
00119         }
00120 
00121         virtual void PrepareForAccess() const
00122         {
00123                 // tell sources to prepare first
00124                 m_psource1->PrepareForAccess();
00125                 m_psource2->PrepareForAccess();
00126 
00127                 // the call the specific mixed's AccessPreparation function
00128                 this->PrepareForAccessAction();
00129         }
